<sunghoon>.name: Sunghoon
<sunghoon>.info: With a soft yet structured look, he carries a calm elegance suited for both romantic and introspective roles. His poised posture conveys confidence and sensitivity.

<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<lee>.name: Lee
<lee>.info: A globally recognized actor, he is renowned for his versatile acting and warm smile. His refined appearance blends intensity with approachability.

<park>.name: Park
<park>.info: An elegant actress with a modern and poised style, she brings sophistication to her roles. Her calm gaze and confident stance show her composure and strength.
